overview: As Executive Vice President of Sales and Business Development, Erwin brings to LiveRail over 12 years of leadership experience within the online space. Erwin directs his team with extensive knowledge, specializing in publisher development, strategy, and team building. Before joining the LiveRail team, Erwin was Vice President of Business Development at Tremor Video, formerly ScanScout, where he focused on strategic partnerships. Prior to this, Erwin held the position of Executive Director of Media and Publisher Services at Eyeblaster and Director of Publisher Services at Advertising.com, now owned by AOL. Erwin holds a B.S. in Advertising from the University of Texas at Austin.
